#summary This document lists future versions and features.
#labels Featured

1.6 - internal tag (Focus: Outline Editing)
   * Drag & Drop - Get it working within a single outline widget
      * cursor updating to indicate the drop position.
      * window status tip updating to print the drop position.
   * Shortcuts - 'Tab' and 'Shift-Tab' aren't working properly.

1.7 - internal tag (Focus: Article Editing)
   * DONE: HTML - All articles stored in the Model as HTML
   * Toolbars - implement toolbars for text styling
   * Shortcuts
   * Menu Items
   * Images - support inserting images into articles
   * Cut & Paste - cut & paste text in an article
   * Undo/Redo

1.8 - public alpha (Focus: Plugins)
   * Tool box - create the tabbed tool box
   * Import/Export Plugins
   * Spell Checking Plugin (provided pyEnchant for Python 2.6 is ready)
   * Find/Replace Plugin

1.9 - public beta (Focus: Distribution)
   * distutils script - write an initial script for distutils
   * py2exe - Get an independent build/executable working.
   * Help File

Version 2.0 (Final Release)
   * All Capabilities of MindTree 1.0

Version 3.0 (Final Release)
   * All Capabilities originally targeted for next major release of MindTree Tk
      * Printing
      * Lists
      * Tables
   * Full Undo/Redo (tree editing and across editing of different articles)

Version 4.0 (Final Release)
   * Create an OutlineView widget (separate the article editor from the OutlineEditor widget)
   * Multiple Views
      * Cut & Paste across
      * Drag & Drop across
      * Changes reflected across
   * Customizable HTML exporting
   * Pluggable Content Views/Handlers
